    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),

    total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    price NUMERIC(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    order_date DATE,
    total_amount NUMERIC(10, 2),
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id INT REFERENCES orders(order_id),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    payment_method VARCHAR(20)
);</t><stat>CREATE TABLE customers (

    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    address VARCHAR(255)
);</stat><divider><t>CREATE TABLE customers (

    contact_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),

    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    payment_method VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE contacts (
    contact_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    contact_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    contact_email VARCHAR(100),
    contact_phone VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    price NUMERIC(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
);

    order_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    order_date DATE,
    total_amount NUMERIC(10, 2),
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

    product_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    price NUMERIC(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
);</t><stat>CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    address VARCHAR(255)
);</stat><divider><t>CREATE TABLE contacts (
    contact_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),

    contact_email VARCHAR(100),

);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    order_date DATE,
    total_amount NUMERIC(10, 2),
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id INT REFERENCES orders(order_id),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    payment_method VARCHAR(20)
);

    customer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,

    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    address VARCHAR(255)

    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id INT REFERENCES orders(order_id),

    payment_method VARCHAR(20)
);

);

    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,

    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id INT REFERENCES orders(order_id),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    payment_method VARCHAR(20)
);

    product_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    price NUMERIC(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
);

    order_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),

);

    order_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    order_date DATE,

);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    order_date DATE,
    total_amount NUMERIC(10, 2),
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    address VARCHAR(255)
);

    product_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    price NUMERIC(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,

    contact_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    contact_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    contact_email VARCHAR(100),
    contact_phone VARCHAR(15)
);

    product_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    price NUMERIC(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
);

    contact_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    contact_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    contact_email VARCHAR(100),
    contact_phone VARCHAR(15)
);

    address VARCHAR(255)
);

    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,

    payment_method VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id INT REFERENCES orders(order_id),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    payment_method VARCHAR(20)
);

    customer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,

    address VARCHAR(255)

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    order_date DATE,
    total_amount NUMERIC(10, 2),
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id INT REFERENCES orders(order_id),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    payment_method VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE contacts (
    contact_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    contact_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    contact_email VARCHAR(100),
    contact_phone VARCHAR(15)
);</t><stat>create table products (
    product_id serial primary key,
    product_name varchar(50) not null,
    price numeric(10, 2) not null,
    description text
);</stat><divider><t>CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    price NUMERIC(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
);

    order_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    order_date DATE,
    total_amount NUMERIC(10, 2),
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

    contact_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    contact_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    contact_email VARCHAR(100),
    contact_phone VARCHAR(15)
);

    payment_method VARCHAR(20)
);

    order_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),

    total_amount NUMERIC(10, 2),

    order_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    order_date DATE,
    total_amount NUMERIC(10, 2),
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

    product_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    price NUMERIC(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT

    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id INT REFERENCES orders(order_id),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    payment_method VARCHAR(20)
);

    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id INT REFERENCES orders(order_id),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    payment_method VARCHAR(20)
);

    contact_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    contact_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    contact_email VARCHAR(100),
    contact_phone VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    order_date DATE,
    total_amount NUMERIC(10, 2),
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    price NUMERIC(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT

    payment_method varchar(20)

);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,

    contact_phone VARCHAR(15)

);

);

);
